title: 18 Perches facing a POPULAR RD in BORALESGAMUWA
details:
BORALESGAMUWA – 18 Perches OR blocks of 10 & 8 perches. Commercial & Residential property, facing a very prominent Popular Road and 2nd Block from Main Road (120 Bus Route) with 60 ft wide Road Frontage.

Ideally suitable for a Showroom, Shops, Office Space, Show Room and Upper Floors for Apartments / Restaurants.

Rs 1,550, 000/- per perch closely negotiable.

Title acceptable for Bank Lending.
Strictly NO Brokers
Contact: 0094772280690
